option1.name: includeChildProjects
option1.label: Include child project data? (True/False)
option1.description: Should the report include data from child projects? (True/False)

option2.name: includeComplianceInformation
option2.label: Include compliance details? (True/False)
option2.description: Should the report include compliance related data? <b>(True/False)

option3.name: maxVersionsBack
option3.label: Maxium number of newer versions? (Integer Number)
option3.description: How many versions behind the most recent release of a component is allowable for compliance?

option4.name: cvssVersion
option4.label: CVSS Version (2.0/3.x)
option4.description: What version of CVSS scoring to report on? (2.0/3.x)
